verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> The gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> shut <S%H5462><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> working <S%H4639><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> but on the sabbath <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7676><s%> it shall be opened, <S%H6605><s%> and in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be opened. <S%H6605><s%>

And the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of that gate <S%H8179><s%> without, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the post <S%H4201><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and he shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the gate: <S%H8179><s%> then he shall go forth; <S%H3318><s%> but the gate <S%H8179><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be shut <S%H5462><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

Likewise the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of this <S%H1931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> and in the new moons. <S%H2320><s%>

And the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

And the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram, <S%H352><s%> and the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he shall be able to give, <S%H4991><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

And in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be a young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> lambs, <S%H3532><s%> and a ram: <S%H352><s%> they shall be <S%H1961><s%> without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

And he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> according as <S%H834><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall attain <S%H5381><s%> unto, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

And when the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter, <S%H935><s%> he shall go in <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of that gate, <S%H8179><s%> and he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> thereof.

But when the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the solemn feasts, <S%H4150><s%> he that entereth in <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate; <S%H8179><s%> and he that entereth <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate: <S%H8179><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> he came in, <S%H935><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> it.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them, when they go in, <S%H935><s%> shall go in; <S%H935><s%> and when they go forth, <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth. <S%H3318><s%>

And in the feasts <S%H2282><s%> and in the solemnities <S%H4150><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> an ephah <S%H374><s%> to a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> to a ram, <S%H352><s%> and to the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he is able to give, <S%H4991><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

Now when <S%H3588><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a voluntary <S%H5071><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> voluntarily <S%H5071><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> one shall then open <S%H6605><s%> him <S%H853><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the east, <S%H6921><s%> and he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> then he shall go forth; <S%H3318><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> his going forth <S%H3318><s%> one shall shut <S%H5462><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Thou shalt daily <S%H3117><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of a lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without blemish: <S%H8549><s%> thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> it every morning. <S%H1242><s%> <S%H1242><s%>

And thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> it every morning, <S%H1242><s%> <S%H1242><s%> the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah, <S%H374><s%> and the third part <S%H7992><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> to temper <S%H7450><s%> <S%H853><s%> with the fine flour; <S%H5560><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus shall they prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lamb, <S%H3532><s%> and the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the oil, <S%H8081><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%> <S%H1242><s%> for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> If <S%H3588><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> unto any <S%H376><s%> of his sons, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> thereof shall be <S%H1961><s%> his sons'; <S%H1121><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall be their possession <S%H272><s%> by inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> he give <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> of his inheritance <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5159><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of his servants, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5650><s%> then it shall be <S%H1961><s%> his to <S%H5704><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of liberty; <S%H1865><s%> after it shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the prince: <S%H5387><s%> but <S%H389><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his sons' <S%H1121><s%> for them.

Moreover the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> take of the people's inheritance by oppression, <S%H3947><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5159><s%> to thrust them out <S%H3238><s%> of their possession; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%> but he shall give <S%H853><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> inheritance <S%H5157><s%> out of his own possession: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> scattered <S%H6327><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from his possession. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%>

After he brought <S%H935><s%> me through the entry, <S%H3996><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was at <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> of <S%H413><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> which looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the north: <S%H6828><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> was a place <S%H4725><s%> on the two sides <S%H3411><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, This <S%H2088><s%> is the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> <S%H853><s%> the trespass offering <S%H817><s%> and the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> where <S%H834><s%> they shall bake <S%H644><s%> the meat offering; <S%H4503><s%> that they bear them not out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H1115><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the utter <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then he brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the utter <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> and caused me to pass <S%H5674><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> in every corner of the court <S%H4740><s%> <S%H2691><s%> <S%H2691><s%> <S%H4740><s%> <S%H2691><s%> there was a court. <S%H2691><s%>

In the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there were courts <S%H2691><s%> joined <S%H7000><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> cubits long <S%H753><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> broad: <S%H7341><s%> these four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H7106><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure. <S%H4060><s%>

And there was a row <S%H2905><s%> of building round about <S%H5439><s%> in them, round about <S%H5439><s%> them four, <S%H702><s%> and it was made <S%H6213><s%> with boiling places <S%H4018><s%> under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the rows <S%H2918><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, These <S%H428><s%> are the places <S%H1004><s%> of them that boil, <S%H1310><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>
